00029 #ifndef LUBYK_INCLUDE_LK_CONSTANTS_H_
00030 #define LUBYK_INCLUDE_LK_CONSTANTS_H_
00031 
00032 #include "lubyk/lua.h"
00033 
00034 #include <string.h>
00035 
00036 namespace lk {
00037 
00038 // Taken from loadlib.c (Lua 5.1)
00039 static int readable (const char *filename) {
00040   FILE *f = fopen(filename, "r");  /* try to open file */
00041   if (f == NULL) return 0;  /* open failed */
00042   fclose(f);
00043   return 1;
00044 }
00045 
00046 // Taken from loadlib.c (Lua 5.1)
00047 static const char *pushnexttemplate (lua_State *L, const char *path) {
00048   const char *l;
00049   while (*path == *LUA_PATHSEP) path++;  /* skip separators */
00050   if (*path == '\0') return NULL;  /* no more templates */
00051   l = strchr(path, *LUA_PATHSEP);  /* find next separator */
00052   if (l == NULL) l = path + strlen(path);
00053   lua_pushlstring(L, path, l - path);  /* template */
00054   return l;
00055 }
00056 
00057 
00058 // <class_name>
00059 // Taken from loadlib.c (Lua 5.1)
00060 LuaStackSize findFile(lua_State *L) {
00061   const char *name  = luaL_checkstring(L, 1);
00062   const char *pname = "path";
00063   const char *path;
00064   name = luaL_gsub(L, name, ".", LUA_DIRSEP);
00065   lua_getfield(L, LUA_ENVIRONINDEX, pname);
00066   path = lua_tostring(L, -1);
00067   if (path == NULL)
00068     luaL_error(L, LUA_QL("package.%s") " must be a string", pname);
00069   lua_pushliteral(L, "");  /* error accumulator */
00070   while ((path = pushnexttemplate(L, path)) != NULL) {
00071     const char *filename;
00072     filename = luaL_gsub(L, lua_tostring(L, -1), LUA_PATH_MARK, name);
00073     lua_remove(L, -2);  /* remove path template */
00074     if (readable(filename)) { /* does file exist and is readable? */
00075       lua_pushstring(L, filename);
00076       return 1;
00077     }
00078     lua_pushfstring(L, "\n\tno file " LUA_QS, filename);
00079     lua_remove(L, -2);  /* remove file name */
00080     lua_concat(L, 2);  /* add entry to possible error message */
00081   }
00082   return 0;  /* not found */
00083 }
00084 
00085 } // lk
